sources.name: UTMaster
sources.script:
source(output(
		WRNUM as string,
		APPL_CLAIM_NUMBER as string,
		CERTIFICATE_NUMBER as string,
		LAND_OWNERSHIP as string,
		WREX_CFS as string,
		WREX_ANDOR as string,
		WREX_ACFT as string,
		WREX_SOURCE as string,
		WREX_COUNTY as string,
		COMMON_DESCRIPTION as string,
		DATE_FILED as string,
		TAKEN_BY_INITIALS as string,
		DATE_PRIORITY as string,
		ADV_NEWSPAPER as string,
		DATE_PUB_BEGAN as string,
		DATE_PROOF_PUB as string,
		PROTESTED as string,
		DATE_PROTEST_END as string,
		MEMO_DECISION as string,
		DATE_APPROVED_REJECTED as string,
		APPROVED_REJECTED as string,
		DATE_PROOF_DUE as string,
		DATE_EXTENSION_FILED as string,
		ELECTION_PROOF as string,
		DATE_ELECTION_PROOF as string,
		DATE_CERT_WUC_ISSUED as string,
		DATE_TERMINATED as string,
		PDBOOK_NUMBER as string,
		TYPE_OF_RIGHT as string,
		WREX_STATUS as string,
		DOCUMENT_ENTERED as string,
		MAP_NUMBER as string,
		DATE_RUSH_LETTER as string,
		DATE_RENOVATED as string,
		DATE_VERIFIED as string,
		VERIFIED_BY_INITIALS as string,
		ENDORSEMENT_COMMENT1 as string,
		ENDORSEMENT_COMMENT2 as string,
		ENDORSEMENT_COMMENT3 as string,
		DATE_PUB_ENDED as string,
		MODIFIED_LOGON as string,
		DATE_RECON_REQUESTED as string,
		RECONSIDER_TYPE as string,
		IRRIGATION_DIVERSION as string,
		IRRIGATION_DEPLETION as string,
		STOCK_DIVERSION as string,
		STOCK_DEPLETION as string,
		DOMESTIC_DIVERSION as string,
		DOMESTIC_DEPLETION as string,
		MUNICIPAL_DIVERSION as string,
		MUNICIPAL_DEPLETION as string,
		MINING_DIVERSION as string,
		MINING_DEPLETION as string,
		POWER_DIVERSION as string,
		POWER_DEPLETION as string,
		OTHER_DIVERSION as string,
		OTHER_DEPLETION as string,
		EXNUM as string,
		EXCHANGE_BASE_WRNUM as string,
		EXCHANGE_CONTRACT_NUMBER as string,
		EXCHANGE_EVIDENCED1 as string,
		EXCHANGE_EVIDENCED2 as string,
		EXCHANGE_EVIDENCED3 as string,
		EXCHANGE_CFS as string,
		EXCHANGE_ANDOR as string,
		EXCHANGE_ACFT as string,
		EXCHANGE_BEG_DATE as string,
		EXCHANGE_END_DATE as string,
		EXCHANGE_SOURCE as string,
		EXCHANGE_COUNTY as string,
		EXCHANGE_PORELEASE_SAME as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_CFS as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_ANDOR as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_ACFT as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_BEG_DATE as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_END_DATE as string,
		WATER_USES as string,
		DATE_WUCS_RECEIVED as string,
		MANUAL_EVALUATION as string,
		ACRE_FEET_EXPORTED as string,
		DATE_HEARING_HELD as string,
		DIVERSION_DUTY as string,
		DEPLETION_DUTY as string,
		GROWING_SEASON as string,
		DATE_FIELD_REVIEW as string,
		AREA_CODE as string,
		ACTIVE_LITIGATION as string,
		DSYSDB_NUMBER as string,
		REPORT_TYPE as string,
		PROOF_DUE_YEARS as string,
		PUBLIC_VIEW as string,
		WATER_USE_REPORTING as string,
		STREAM_ALT_REQUIRED as string,
		DAM_PERMIT_REQUIRED as string,
		WR_SOLE_SUPPLY as string,
		DATE_LAPSING_LETTER as string,
		STOCK_COMPANY_ID as string,
		SHARES_OF_STOCK as string,
		OSE_SIGNATURE as string,
		CERT_SIGNATURE as string,
		PROOF_PROF_LICENSE_NUMBER as string,
		COUNTY_TAX_ID as string,
		LAST_MODIFIED_TYPE as string,
		LAST_MODIFIED_TABLE as string,
		FILE_DESTROYED as string,
		DATE_50YEAR_PERIOD as string,
		SUB_BASIN_NUMBER as string,
		SUB_BASIN_NAME as string,
		DIVDEP_DOCUMENT_ID as string,
		FULL_SUPPLY_EQUIVALENCE as string,
		RECORD_ID as string,
		SHARES_DISTRIBUTION as string,
		DECREE_CLASS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTMaster

sources.name: UTWaterSources
sources.script:
source(output(
		WaterSourceUUID as string,
		WaterSourceNativeID as string,
		WaterSourceName as string,
		WaterSourceTypeCV as string,
		WaterQualityIndicatorCV as string,
		GNISFeatureNameCV as string,
		Geometry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTWaterSources

sinks.name: NormalizedWaterSources
sinks.script:
UnionWaterSources sink(input(
		WaterSourceUUID as string,
		WaterSourceNativeID as string,
		WaterSourceName as string,
		WaterSourceTypeCV as string,
		WaterQualityIndicatorCV as string,
		GNISFeatureNameCV as string,
		Geometry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['watersources.csv']) ~> NormalizedWaterSources

transformations.name: DerivedMaster
transformations.script:
UTMaster derive(WaterSourceUUID = 'UT_' + WRNUM,
		WaterSourceNativeID = WRNUM,
		WaterSourceName = WREX_SOURCE,
		WaterSourceTypeCV = 'Unknown',
		WaterQualityIndicatorCV = 'Fresh',
		GNISFeatureNameCV = '',
		Geometry = '') ~> DerivedMaster

transformations.name: SelectWaterSources
transformations.script:
DerivedMaster select(mapColumn(
		WaterSourceUUID,
		WaterSourceNativeID,
		WaterSourceName,
		WaterSourceTypeCV,
		WaterQualityIndicatorCV,
		GNISFeatureNameCV,
		Geometry
	))~> SelectWaterSources
